QuestData.Title: Wyrm Food
QuestData.Description:
It's hungry work, defending and fighting for the Obsidian Citadel, and dragons can eat a great deal. We need to replenish our stores.
Lurking beneath the hardened lava, squirming through the magma, are some very tasty worms. This may not appeal to you, but to a hungry dragon, they are delicious.
Take our servant Gulchak and use his pointer to direct him towards disturbances in the lava. He will attract the worms for you to harvest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Lava-Charred Flesh from Crust Lurkers in the Emberflow.
